source: Hampurissa järjestetyn teollisuusmaiden G20-kokouksen yhteydessä tavanneet Yhdysvaltain presidentti Donald Trump ja Venäjän presidentti Vladimir Putin näyttivät tulevan toimeen keskenään mainiosti.

reference: When meeting at the G20 summit in Hamburg, Donald Trump, the President of the USA, and Vladimir Putin, the President of Russia, seemed to get along nicely.

source: Sittemmin tunnelma on jäähtynyt huomattavasti.
translation_clean:
Explanation:
1. "Sittemmin tunnelma" was translated as "The sitter tunnel" which is not correct, so I changed it to "The sitter tunnel has" to maintain the proper sentence structure in English.
2. "Jäähtynyt huomattavasti" means "has significantly dropped" in English, which fits well with "The sitter tunnel has significantly dropped."
3. "Tunnelma on yksi tärkeimmistä keskustelujen aiheista" translates to "The tunnel is one of the main topics of discussion," where "tunnelma" is translated to "tunnel" and "keskustelujen aiheista" to "topics of discussion." The word order has been adjusted to fit natural English syntax. To make the sentence more fluent, I have changed "on yksi" (is one) to "is one
